price: Allah is the Knower of the unseen in the heavens and earth. He is All-Knowing of what is in the hearts.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
